A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I went into the cinema with really low expectations. But i was not prepared to the abysmal writing of The Last Jedi.
To begin\, the movie is filled with silly jokes. And I like the jokes in the other SW movies. But here the jokes are place before every serious moment in the movie. 
Part of the plot revolves around Rey learning the way of the force. And i can go with that. The other part is this absurd idea that for 1.5 hours of the movie the good guys ship is chased by the bad guys. But this is not a hiding running chase like the one in The Empire Strikes Back. Here they just run a little ahead of the bad guys. That keep Shooting to them. For 1 hour. It just does not make sense.
But my undoing was another. There has been a consistency in the star wars univers up until this movie\, for space battles and how the SW universe looks at space travel and space battle. 
In this movie they just cancel all this. 
But that's my thing\, i'm an engineer and I can't stand that crap. the fact is that the movie is so flawed that anybody chan pick their personal reason to dislike it.
